name: ToneVoid
description:
ToneVoid is an very short, experimental puzzle game inspired by games like Beyond Perception and Superliminal where you make your way through rooms full of puzzles and optical illusions without any depth perception.

WARNING - this game can possibly cause seizures (so don't play if you've had seizures before or have a condition that would make you subjectable to seizures)

Also this is my first game so any feedback would be appreciated.
